item.title: Integrating mogenerator in your XCode project
item.description: Every iOS app you build would require some sort of storage functionality within the device itself, especially if it caches data fetched from the network. Core Data, an object graph management framework developed by Apple will mostly likely be your choice in this regard. In that case, a tool like mogenerator is indispensable.
